beats.visual: Pixel calibrates trampoline knobs labeled 'cartoon mode'.
Test jump launches Pixel into slow orbit around birdbath.
Pixel scribbles equations midair with floating chalk.
Trampoline morphs into wave sending Pixel surfing.
Gravity pauses; Pixel floats sipping juice box.
Pixel rebounds downward, trampoline becomes giant drum.
beats.gag_note: Drum beat syncs with heartbeat monitor.

beats.visual: Backflip chain reaction launches garden gnomes cheering.
Pixel lands hero pose as trampoline bows politely.
Clip ends with slow float high-five to camera.

tts_line: Pixel thinks gravity is just a polite suggestion.
style_prompt: cartoon neon glitch cat, pixel shimmer fur, clean bold outlines, flat neon colors, soft rim light, dynamic angle, vertical 9:16, backyard trampoline lab with floating chalk equations, fast cuts, vertical 9:16
